text: Admitting a mistake while claiming ignorance, like General Mark Milley and Republican lawmakers have recently done, is a way of abdicating responsibility, @mashagessen writes. “History is familiar with this trick and does not look kindly on it.” https://t.co/lGSaaKu3XO
